Name: Tawantinsuyu (Incas)
History: The Tawantinsuyu(lit The Four Regions),was the largest empire in pre-columbian America.The Inca civilization arose from the Peruvian hightlands sometime in the early 13th century. Its las stronghold was conquered by the Spanish in 1572. From 1438 to 1533, the Incas incorporated a large portion of western South America, centered on the Andean Mountains, using conquest and peaceful assimilation, among other methods.At its largest, the empire joined Peru, western Ecuador, western and south central Bolivia, northwest Argentina, a large portion of what is today Chile, and the southwestern most tip of Colombia into a state comparable to historical empires of Eurasia.

Heroes.Name: Sapa Inca Capac Yupanqui
Heroes.History: (Quechua Qhapaq Yupanki Inka, splendid accountant Inca) was the fifth Sapa Inca of the Kingdom of Cusco (beginning around CE 1320) and the last of the Hurin dynasty.

Heroes.Name: Sapa Inca Pachacutec
Heroes.History: (Quechua: Pachakutiq Inka Yupanki) was the ninth Sapa Inca (1418–1471/1472) of the Kingdom of Cusco which he transformed into the Inca Empire (Quechua: Tawantinsuyu). Most archaeologists now believe that the famous Inca site of Machu Picchu was built as an estate for Pachacuti.

Heroes.Name: Sapa Inca Sinchi Roca
Heroes.History: Sinchi Ruq'a Inka (Quechua for valorous generous Inca) was the second Sapa Inca of the Kingdom of Cusco (beginning around 1230 CE, though as early as 1105 CE according to some) and a member of the Hurin dynasty (first dynasty).

CivBonuses.Name: Tambos
CivBonuses.Description: The Incas had a good administration which gives you a trickle of resources.

TeamBonuses.Name: Taxes and Tambos
TeamBonuses.Description: The Incas had a good administration which gives you a trickle of resources for you and your ally's
